name: bitcode-builder
description: API for building CFG graph for compilation to LLVM bitcode

scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts src/**/*.ts src/**/**/*.ts test/*.ts
scripts.test: mocha -r ts-node/register/type-check --reporter spec test/*-test.ts && npm run lint
